docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES.--Skiers may be schussing down the White Mountains of New Hampshire and skaters trying the ice of  New York's Central Park, but here in Argentina the question of the moment is how to spend one's Summer--not one's Winter--vacation.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Feb. 3--With Germany eliminated from LatinAmerican markets by the European war, Great Britain is now directing a vigorous trade drive on most of the continent to recapture trade lost to the Reich during a decade.
